actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 100-171.

official_title: A bill to strengthen provisions of the law that provide safeguards when imports  threaten to impair the national security.
short_title: National Security and Trade Act of 1987

summary.text: National Security and Trade Act of 1987 - Amends the Trade Expansion Act of 1962 to require the President to take action within 90 days of receiving a report from the Secretary of Commerce that articles are being imported in such quantities, or under such circumstances, as to impair national security.
